about_the_game:
Enigma's Edge™: A Roguelike Science-Fantasy RPG Inspired by Classic Dungeon Crawlers

Are You Ready to Face the Edge?

Awakened from cryostasis after a century, you find yourself trapped in the remnants of a crashed spaceship—now part of an underground labyrinth on the planet Delavorn. This world, where advanced technology intertwines with medieval fantasy, has been irrevocably altered by the remnants of your vessel. As one of the surviving crew members, you must lead a party of three unique adventurers through a dark and mysterious maze in a roguelike experience that combines classic dungeon crawling with immersive environmental puzzles.

Embark on a Journey That Challenges Mind and Strategy

  • Classic Dungeon Crawling Reimagined:

    • Explore intricate dungeons inspired by the depth and challenge of Wizardry 7.

    • Navigate a labyrinth filled with monsters, traps, and hidden treasures.

  • Immersive Environmental Puzzles:

    • Interact with the environment to solve puzzles essential for progression.

    • Manipulate mechanisms, operate ancient machinery, and alter dungeon configurations.

    • Use your characters' unique abilities to overcome obstacles and unlock new paths.

  • Strategic Party-Based Gameplay:

    • Control and customize a party of three adventurers, each with unique skills crucial for overcoming the labyrinth's challenges.

    • Party Splitting Mechanics: Some puzzles and obstacles require you to divide your party, coordinating simultaneous actions like activating mechanisms, defending against enemies, and navigating new pathways.

  • Turn-Based Combat:

    • Engage in tactical battles against a variety of foes in a turn-based combat system.

    • Every encounter demands careful planning and strategic use of each character's abilities.

Environmental Storytelling in a Science-Fantasy World

  • Discover the Impact of Advanced Technology:

    • Uncover how different factions on Delavorn have embraced, rejected, or exploited the advanced technology from your crashed ship.

    • Experience a narrative woven into the environment, where every detail adds to the unfolding story.

  • Atmospheric Exploration:

    • Navigate through environments rich with visual cues, audio hints, and interactive objects.

    • Encounter brief narrative elements that enhance immersion, such as subtle sounds or peculiar sights that hint at hidden dangers or secrets.

The Journey Begins with "Escape Protocol"

In this initial release, "Escape Protocol," your primary objective is to escape the underground labyrinth that your portion of the ship has become. As you delve deeper, you'll encounter the consequences of the technology introduced to Delavorn—factions that have either advanced, suffered, or remained unchanged due to its influence. Your actions will shape not only your fate but also the future of this world.

One Developer, One Vision

For more than 5 years, Enigma's Edge™ has been a solo endeavor, developed in the creator's spare time. This passion project is built on a foundation of creativity and dedication, combining dungeon crawling, puzzles, and strategy into a single unforgettable experience.

Are You Ready to Face the Edge?

Embark on an adventure where every decision matters and every corner holds a new mystery. Whether you're a veteran of classic RPGs or new to the genre, Enigma's Edge™ offers a rich, engaging experience that challenges your strategic thinking and problem-solving skills in a roguelike science-fantasy setting.

Join the Adventure Today!

Follow us on social media for updates, behind-the-scenes content, and exclusive sneak peeks. Prepare to embark on a journey like no other.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04, SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 30 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD R7 370 (2 GB VRAM) with OpenGL 4.3 or Vulkan support
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA or PulseAudio compatible sound card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, SteamOS 3.0, or a newer Linux distribution
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (6 GB) or AMD RX 580 (8 GB) with Vulkan support
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA or PulseAudio compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (Quad-Core) or Apple M1 chip
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 560 (4 GB VRAM) or Apple M1 integrated GPU
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11.0 Big Sur or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or Apple M1 Pro/Max chip
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 580 (8 GB VRAM) or Apple M1 Pro/Max integrated GPU
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

name: Enigma's Edge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD R7 370 (2 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (6 GB) or AMD RX 580 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card

short_description: Enigma's Edge™ is a roguelike science-fantasy RPG where you lead a party of three adventurers through a vast, darkly beautiful world filled with monsters, hidden treasures, and intricate clockwork puzzles.
